column2: Man]] [[Eriol]] and an [[Elf]] [[Naimi]] (Éadgifu). In one version of the [[legendarium]] he was the one who completed the [[Golden Book]], in which was written the history of the [[Elder Days]], and it was kept in [[Tol Eressëa]].<ref>{{LT2

column1: He settled in the village of [[Tavrobel]] (later known as the [[wikipedia:Great Haywood
column2: Great Haywood]]; also known as ''Hǽgwudu se gréata'' in [[Old English]]).<ref>{{LT2
